name: Switzerland
declaringWar: I cannot stand your antics any longer! You will soon learn their true cost, in war.
attacked: Then war it shall be! Though I'm afraid your ambitions shall soon be put to rest!
defeated: Our defenses have crumbled... but still we will not rest.
introduction: Well met! I am Jonas Furrer, hailing from Switzerland, land of renowned fortresses and mercenaries.
tradeRequest: I believe this courtesy would help serve both of our interests.
uniques: Gain a free [Walls] [in all cities] <after discovering [Masonry]>
[+50]% Production when constructing [Pikeman] units [in all cities]
